title: Kaboomblah's tip of the day!
body:
Don't waste time warding shit unnecessarily.

25 minutes into the game. The enemy is ahead, you've got no vision control.

They've just taken Dragon.

Don't fucking go bot-side to start warding. What the fuck is wrong with you? The objective has already been taken. What's the point of doing that now?

Go and get vision control around Baron, you nonce. 

If your Sweeper detects nothing, then actively ping your team to assist you so you can pick off the enemy Support who will be looking to ward Baron now.

The amount of times I see, "Enemy team has slain the Dragon", and then have our Support proceed to walk towards the Dragon pit to ward around it.

Absolutely nonsensical, garbage-arse move.
